channel.title: Travis Ci on SadatRocks

item.title: Setting Up Sadatrocks 🌏
item.description: Prologue SadatRocks is my platform for writing blogs and manage my cookbooks. I love 💝 hugo, which is The world’s fastest framework for building websites. So I used kube as a theme to develop SadatRocks with hugo. Then I need to come up with a plan for building a pipeline for SadatRocks. The plan I am going to use User/Organization Page strategy here for hosting my static files with github.
